channel.title: How to add vesta spear, stat hammer, and v long attack right with spec?[508]
channel.description: [size=15pt]Hey, Title says pretty much all, but i have the models in the client, they all can be weilded, and have bonuses and can attack, so my next question is, how do i make a special for them/ attack the right way? for example, vesta spear hits like... weird... not like a spear, also how can i make the vesta spear 2 handed? i cant seem to find the answers to these questions, so can some one please help me? and if i need new models like a special anim or something can some one tell me where to find them/name/ a link :D that would be VERY helpful.[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 03:30:00 pm[/size][hr][size=10pt]Can some one please help me??? if you cant then just leave a comment saying you cant, or tell me a person who would know... :mad:[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 08:10:43 pm[/size][hr]ANY ONE GONNA ANSWER YET?? PLEASE CMON...
